REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3857 reute r f BC-ACTON-<ATN>-SETS-ONE 06-18 0055

TEXT.TITLE: ACTON <ATN> SETS ONE FOR FIVE REVERSE SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Acton Corp said shareholders at the annaul meeting approved a one-for-five reverse split that takes effect June 25. It said holders also approved a limitation of directors' liability and indemnity agreements between the company and its officers and directors. Reuter
